00027 template<int size, class T> class Vector;
00028 
00029 template<int size, class T = double>
00030 class ColumnVector : public Matrix<size, 1, T>, public VectorBase<T>
00031 {
00032 public:
00033   
00034   
00035     inline ColumnVector() {}
00040     inline ColumnVector(const ColumnVector<size, T> &columnVector);
00044     inline ColumnVector(const Matrix<size,1,T> &matrix);
00050     inline ColumnVector(const Vector<size,T> &vector);
00055     ~ColumnVector(){}
00061     virtual T *getElementsPointer() const { return (T *) &d_element[0][0]; }
00066     inline T length() const;
00070     inline virtual T getElement(int elementPosition) const;
00075     inline virtual void setElement(int elementPosition, T elementValue);
00081     virtual bool isRowVector() const {return false;}
00085     virtual int getNumElements() const {return size;}
00089     inline T &operator()(int elementPosition);
00102     inline T operator()(int elementPosition) const;
00113     inline ColumnVector<size, T> &operator=(const VectorBase<T> &vectorBase);
00120     MatrixInitializer<T> operator=(const T &elementValue);
00132 private:
00133 };
00134 
00135 
00136 template<class T>
00137 ColumnVector<3,T> crossProduct(const ColumnVector<3,T> &firstColumnVector, const ColumnVector<3,T> &secondColumnVector);
00146 template<int size, class T>
00147 ColumnVector<size, T> elementProduct(const ColumnVector<size,T> &firstColumnVector, const ColumnVector<size,T> &secondColumnVector);
00158 template<int size, class T>
00159 T dotProduct(const ColumnVector<size,T> &firstColumnVector, const ColumnVector<size,T> &secondColumnVector);
00167 template<int size, class T>
00168 inline RowVector<size, T> transpose(const ColumnVector<size, T> &vector);
00172 };
00173 #endif
